EmailTemplate.name: 30-Day - Live Demo
EmailTemplate.subject: Your VMTurbo Live Demo: Put Your Virtual Decisions on Autopilot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> You Make Approximately 35,000 Decisions A Day. Put the Virtual Ones On Autopilot. <http://vmturbo.com/product/request-a-demo?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=30_day_love&utm_content=live_demo>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, You've seen the trial, you've had your hands on the product, now let us guide you to 100% enlightenment. Our team of experts will give you a personalized walk through of VMTurbo showing you just how VMTurbo can optimize your environment. Are you ready to get more detail and see the product in action? Want to learn about the differences between VMTurbo and other virtualization management solutions? Sign up for a free 30-minute demonstration today! <http://vmturbo.com/product/request-a-demo?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=30_day_love&utm_content=live_demo> <http://vmturbo.com/product/request-a-demo?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=30_day_love&utm_content=live_demo>Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
